generatedTitle: The Detroit Tigers: A History of Championship Success and Recent Struggles

extractFactDictList.question: Where are the Detroit Tigers based?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Detroit Tigers are a professional baseball team based in Detroit, Michigan.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the last time the Detroit Tigers went to the World Series?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Detroit Tigers have appeared in the World Series several times in their history, but their last appearance was in 2012 when they lost to the San Francisco Giants in four games.

extractFactDictList.question: How many championships have the Detroit Tigers won?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The team has a rich history in Major League Baseball (MLB) and has won several championships over the years.

extractFactDictList.sentence: Since their last appearance in the World Series, the Detroit Tigers have not had a winning season.
